text:

title: Used to love it...
text:
It used to be an easy but accurate way to track my packages. It was nice, being able to track all my packages at once, even if they all were shipped with different services or were from different companies. 
It was always on point, up to date, and it was always easy to find information about a package.
Now all the app does is take up storage. 
The tracking is inaccurate at best. Many of my packages still show "in transit" despite being delivered weeks ago. Many have completely inaccurate information when it comes to where they are (cross-referencing the information with the actual shipping service), and most don't even have information, and are permanently loading sometimes even months after the order was placed. 
To say it has become useless is an understatement. I can't use it for the one thing I downloaded it for, which is a shame because it was very handy, and had some really good and even fun features (like confetti when something was delivered). But there's literally no point in me having it anymore.

text:
